title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.70 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.70 - Applicability

State Regulations

Sections
5-1.70
through
5-1.79
of this Subpart shall be applicable to all public water systems, provided the systems serve 15 or more service connections or serve 25 or more persons. Sections
5-1.71
(c) and (d), 5-1.72
(c), and 5- 1.78(a)(4) of this Part apply to all public water systems. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.70

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
